title: Monthly Service Fee
description: You must pay Rs.100 every month to keep the bank running. This fee is separate from your bank account balance and goes towards operational costs.

title: Deposit Policy
description: You can deposit any amount into your bank account with a 1% transaction fee. The Rs.100 monthly fee does not go into your account - it's purely for service maintenance.

title: Daily Deposit Limits
description: As this is NOT a commercial bank, you can only deposit up to Rs.10,000 per day. Each individual transaction is limited to Rs.5,000.

title: Loan Restrictions
description: You cannot take more than 1 loan at a time. You must fully repay your current loan before applying for a new one.

title: Credit Score Requirement
description: You cannot take a loan if your credit score is less than 3 out of 10. Maintain a good repayment history to keep your score above the minimum threshold.

title: Bank Type Disclaimer
description: Ghosh Cooperative Bankings is a cooperative banking institution, NOT a commercial bank. We operate under cooperative banking principles with member-focused services and limitations.
